info.name: gaia online fix guild navigation bar at top
info.description: a small script to fix the guild nav bar and add a little color to it.
info.additionalInfo:
fixes the guild navigation bar to have all the buttons in one area instead of having them in different places, also gives a little color to the guild navigation bar to make it look nicer. this also makes a slight adjustment on the my gaia navigation bar too if your not using better gaia or gaia upgrade works rather your a captain or a member and the drop down moderator panel for guilds is not affected in any way just makes it look nicer. at this time i believe the color can be changed on the navigation bar but it only accepts solid colors like blue or green not the #hex codes but you can try.

UPDATE: 9/21 navbar improvements to guilds and all #hex should work now not just a select few

UPDATE: 10/27 font adjustment in guilds navbar (if you want the old font back change line 18 back to bold. the old format will appear {or bolder if you want a bolder text than gaia has} )

10/27 - please note: 
this script also fixes the old arenas navbar as well. a minor adjustment also occurs when put together with the clan navbar fix. 
it may also affect the marketplace navbar too in some cases

10/29 this fix takes care of a few things, 1- you dont actually need the seperate script for clans now that i just created a couple of days ago. that fix has been combined in here, 
2- this userstyle is now on greasyfork as well but you will still need the clan fix in here if you use the greasyfork one. still having issues getting that patch to work in there for clans only. 
3- this now fixes the arena and marketplace navbar to look like guilds and clans so its much more seamless across the different areas of the site. 
so if your just concerned about guilds and not clans you can use greasyfork too now. but if you want them both fixed and the arena / marketplace nav fix too then you need to update this one here

1/15/2017 changed some lines of code to make it more seamless
